title: Nidesoft DVD to AVI Converter Platinum-serial incl
description:
Advanced Functions
Rip DVD to AVI Software
It could support Archos MP4, iRiver PMP, Creative Zen Vision, MP4/MP3 Player. Also, it can convert DVD to many other video format or music format.
Powerful video and audio editing
Crop:
You could crop the origin DVD movie, and strech to many resolutions as you like.
Trim:
The trim function enable you to set a range and cut a part from one chapter or title.
Effects:
You can set brightness, contrast and saturation, and it also provide several special effects for you, such as "Grey film". 
Merge into one file 
You could merge several chapters you selected into one file as you like. 
Supports single-step conversion 
Compared with other DVD to AVI Converter, Nidesoft DVD to AVI Converter platinum supports single-step conversion and flexible title and chapter choices. 
Supports batch file ripping. 
You can check the chapters or titles you want to convert and convert them one by one. It also allows you to select any audio track and subtitle as you want. 

Features: 
Full support Intel Pentium4 Hyper-Threading Processor and Pentium D Processor (820,830 and 840), so fast converting speed. 
Allow you to select a language or audio track when ripping multi-language DVD.Allow you to select target subtitle or chapter.
Sound normalization.Normalizes sound levels of DVD;Output file size is adjustable ;
Very fast converting speed and excellent video quality;So easy to use that only a few clicks are enough; 
Output file size is adjustable. You can compress movies to any size you need;
Codecs are all built-in; High quality but low price!!! 
Easy and simple to use software for beginners;Sound normalization. Normalizes sound levels;
Optimized for Processor (SSE2/SSE/MMX/3DNow!) and Graphics Card Acceleration. The new version provides more friendly interface,and better quality.
Fully optimized for Dual Core, Hyper-Thread processor. 
Up to 4x faster than other software. Provide >400% converting speed, beyond your imagination;
Free Update!!! Very good Day Email Service; 

System Requirements
OS Supported:
Windows 98/ME/NT4/2000/2003/XP and Windows Vista
Hardware:
Intel Pentium II 350MHz or above, or any Athlon ; 64 MB RAM or above
